title: RemoteOK Job Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from RemoteOK (https://remoteok.com/remote-jobs). Collects comprehensive job data including title, company, location, job type, category, salary, and descriptions.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Custom RemoteOK listing URLs to start scraping from. If provided, these will override the search query.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Keyword to filter job searches on RemoteOK.

dateFilter.title: Date Filter
dateFilter.description: Filter jobs by posting date when using keyword search.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for stable scraping of RemoteOK.
